title: CXR–EHR Fusion for Sepsis/ARDS (ICU)
summary: Multimodal representation learning using CXR embeddings + EHR features to predict outcomes and treatment response; explored PCA/t‑SNE, VAEs, CLIP‑style contrastive learning.

title: Eczema Herpeticum Diagnosis
summary: Custom CNN + traditional features with Grad‑CAM; improved data preprocessing and reproducibility; pipeline integrated into lab workflow.

title: RL for Oncology (Concept)
summary: Personalised therapy scheduling via reinforcement learning with toxicity constraints and patient‑specific response models.
